full_description:
Sony ZV-1F 20.1 MP 4K Vlogging Digital Camera

The Sony ZV-1F Vlogging Camera is a pocket-sized camera with a huge 1" sensor and a 20mm-equivalent wide-angle lens that was specifically created for vloggers and online content makers. You may use the Sony ZV-1F camera to snap a group selfie with a wide-angle view of the surroundings and include everyone in the photo, even if they're not in the frame. Since the lens has a wider field of view than the human eye, you can snap photographs both inside and outside that have astounding depth and perspective. The Sony ZV-1F 20.1 MP Vlogging Digital Camera is designed to be portable and lightweight, so you can easily capture daily life and get material on the go. The Sony ZV-1F also addresses this need with a flip-out 3.0" touchscreen and a directional 3-capsule microphone ideal for front-facing recording. Also, the Sony ZV-1F 20.1 MP 4K Vlogging Digital Camera appeals to users who value the camera's exclusive Product Showcase setting, backdrop defocus feature, real-time Eye AF (autofocus), Face Priority AE (auto-exposure), as well as a new touchscreen interface that makes it simpler to use.

title: Sony ZV-1 20.1MP Vlogging 4K Digital Camera for Content Creator
cat_seo_title: Sony Digital Camera Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Sony Digital Camera at best price in Bangladesh. Find your Sony Digital Cam at lowest price in Star Tech. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
Sony ZV-1 20.1MP Vlogging 4K Digital Camera for Content Creator

No experience is necessary to capture great-looking videos. The ZV-1 is designed to capture amazing videos of you and your world, without any tricky setup. The ZV-1 makes all skin colors look vibrant, natural and healthy. There's also an optional Soft Skin Effect mode for a smoother look. The ZV-1's Fast Hybrid AF system lets you simply and quickly switch focus from a face to the background, for more stylistic and watchable videos. By just pushing the Bokeh switch, you can switch background bokeh on and off â€” no need for complex manual adjustments. Now it's easy to simply select a professional-looking defocused background, or keep the entire scene in focus, with just the press of a button. Product Showcase Setting allows you to switch with just a single button press to settings that are perfect for product reviews. It widens the angle of view and switches the focus to the object instantly, so you don't need to wait for the focus to shift or place your hand behind the product to shift the focus to it. The ZV-1 is built to get great shots while you're moving. With amazing image stabilization, you can shoot smooth video when walking, and as the light goes from shadow to sun or outdoors to in, the automatic exposure (AE) tracks faces and makes sure they always appear well-lit. The ZV-1 is designed to bring together simplicity and power, opening up creative opportunities as wide as your imagination. There's no longer a need to compromise your images with your smartphone camera just to share content quickly. The ZV-1 delivers both stunning images and seamless connectivity, for better and easier posting. The ZV-1 design makes creating outstanding selfie and vlog content easy. Right down to the last detail, the ZV-1 is all about empowering you to make inspirational content. The vari-angle LCD touchscreen flips out horizontally, making it perfect for selfies and vlogging. Clear of ports, microphones and mounting shoes, it allows for precise framing and fluid operation even while in front of the camera. Carry professional-quality video along in your pocket, with stunning 4K HDR detail and powerful exposure tools for content guaranteed to impress. Check out the features of the ZV-1 for vlogging and content creation. Check out this in-depth movie tour of the features of the ZV-1. The Imaging Edge Webcam application makes it easy to use your Sony camera as a high-quality webcam, with wide compatibility, for impressive live-streaming and conferencing. Content creation is made simple with the Sony ACCVC1 Vlogger Accessory Kit which includes a wireless Bluetooth grip that conveniently converts into a small tripod (GP-VPT2BT) and 64GB UHS-II SD Card (SF-E64/T1) with fast write speeds. The GP-VPT2BT Bluetooth grip is compatible with many Sony cameras including the ZV-1 Camera for Content Creators and Vloggers.

title: Sony ZV-1 II 21.0MP Digital Camera
cat_seo_title: Sony Digital Camera Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Sony Digital Camera at best price in Bangladesh. Find your Sony Digital Cam at lowest price in Star Tech. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
Sony ZV-1 II 21.0MP Digital Camera

The Sony ZV-1 II 21.0MP Digital Camera has a lens with an F1.8 to F4.0 maximum aperture range and a focal length range of 6.9mm to 17.6mm (35mm format equivalent: 18mm to 50mm). It has a 1.0-type Exmor RS CMOS sensor with 21.0 megapixels for still photographs and up to 16.8 megapixels for videos. For still photographs, the camera supports JPEG and RAW formats, while for films, it supports XAVC S (MPEG-4 AVC/H.264). It can record 4K and HD movies at various frame rates. The Sony ZV-1 II Digital camera's focus technology employs Fast Hybrid AF, which includes both phase-detection AF and contrast-detection AF. It has several focus modes, including human and animal focus. For exposure management, the camera incorporates a 1200-zone evaluative metering system with an ISO sensitivity range of 125 to 12800 for still photos and videos. It also has options for cinematic vlogs, picture styles, backdrop defocus, and clear image zoom. The Sony ZV-1 II is equipped with a 7.5 cm (3.0-type) TFT touch panel LCD monitor with 921,600 pixels and customizable angles. It features Wi-Fi and Bluetooth wireless connectivity for smartphone viewing, remote control, and PC remote capabilities. For movies, the camera includes an electronic image stabilization system built in, as well as an electronic shutter with shutter speeds ranging from 1/32000 to 1/4 seconds for still photographs. The Sony ZV-1 II Digital camera also has a multi-slot for Memory Stick Duo/SD memory cards, a built-in microphone, a USB power source, and a rechargeable battery (NP-BX1). The camera measures roughly 105.5 x 60.0 x 46.7 mm (4 1/4 x 2 3/8 x 1 7/8 inches).

Buy Sony ZV-1 II 21.0MP Digital Camera from Star Tech
